context: I'm looking for some light sci-fi. Week is OVER!
Something like Star Trek Beyond (2016) And there's the original Invasion of the Body Snatchers (1956)
Well, that's OK. I was thinking more like robot stuff like the kid with the AI teddy bear. I also liked Never Let Me Go (2010)
Oh, Invasion of the Body Snatchers (1956) was good so was Cocoon (1985)
Never saw Big Hero 6 (2014) but I'll look at it.
It's animated. I think you'll like it
Thanks! Not real into annimation! I guess I could take something like World War Z
Whatever you choose,hope you have a great weekend. Sounds like you deserve one

resp: I'm torn between going to see Ocean's 8 (2018) and staying in to watch Kubo and the Two Strings (2016)
